body.p: I had the honor to receive from his Excellency the Governor of Kentucky (at the time) a commission appointing me a Commissioner for the State of Kentucky residing in the State of California to take the acknowledgement and proof of Deeds &c &c Having removed to this city and being desirous to continue the same profession here I most respectfully request that a commission may issue for this State the fees for which will be remitted upon its receipt with the oath required by law.

I have the honor to be
Very Respectfully
Your Obd Svt &c &c
L. W. Sloat

To His Excellency
Thos E. Bramlett
Govr of the State of Kentucky
Frankfort Ky.
Comr Deeds
New York
L. W. Sloat
comd
1st Nov 1865
